hide_on_mobile.label: Hide Empty Cart on Mobile Devices
hide_on_mobile.comment: Empty cart can be hidden on mobile devices (if browser viewport is narrower than 480 pixels).

show_if_no_children.label: Show Category Blocks if No Sub-categories
show_if_no_children.comment: If set to "Yes", custom Category Blocks will be displayed in the drop-down box even if the category doesn't have any sub-categories.

static_identifier.label: Static block identifier:
static_identifier.comment:
Which static block you want they show on menu (Seperate by Semicolon And you want to put it right added up :right after Identifier).
Example: custom_menu:right

url_key.label: CMS Page Url Key:
url_key.comment:
Which cms page you want they show on menu (Seperate by Semicolon And you want to put it right added up :right after url key).
Example: about-magento-demo-store:right

label1.label: Label 1
label1.comment: Define the text of the category label 1. Labels can be assigned to every category in Catalog > Manage Categories.

label2.label: Label 2
label2.comment: Define the text of the category label 2. Labels can be assigned to every category in Catalog > Manage Categories.

aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of the product images (height of the images will be calculated Image aspect ratio size).

alt_image.label: Alternative Image
alt_image.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the main image.

alt_image_column.label: Select Alt. Image By Column
alt_image_column.comment: Which column of the product image gallery will mark alternative images of your products.

alt_image_column_value.label: Alt. Image Column Value
alt_image_column_value.comment: Specify the value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alt. Image By Column is set to "Sort Order", specify the number which will mark (in "Sort Order" column of the product image gallery) alternative images, for example: "2".

image_width.label: Image Width
image_width.comment: Set width image in page products list.

image_height.label: Image Height
image_height.comment: Set height image in page products list.

column_count.label: Number of Columns
column_count.comment: Number of products displayed in a single row.

column_count_768.label: Number of Columns Below 768px
column_count_768.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 640 px and 768 px.

column_count_640.label: Number of Columns Below 640px
column_count_640.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 480px and 640 px.

column_count_480.label: Number of Columns Below 480px
column_count_480.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 320 px and 480 px. Below that width products are displayed in a single column.

equal_height.label: Equal Height of Grid Items (Products)
equal_height.comment: If enabled, all grid items have the same height and "Add to cart" button is displayed at the bottom edge of the item.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product. Important: enable in order to use "Display On Hover" in Display Selected Elements.

display_addtolinks.label: "Add to" Links
display_addtolinks.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Simple Icons
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links with icons.

replace_upsell.label: Up-sell Products
replace_upsell.comment: To replace Up-sell Products first enable static block with ID block_product_replace_upsell

replace_related.label: Related Products
replace_related.comment: To replace Related Products first enable static block with ID block_product_replace_related

product_slider.label: Product Sliders
product_slider.comment: This section is related to product sliders. "Speed" will be applied for all existing product sliders, also on product page. Other settings are only applied to Featured Products Slider blocks and New Products blocks.

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the product sliders, specify time (in milliseconds) between slide transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

move_items.label: Move Items
move_items.comment: Number of items that should move on animation. Enter 0 to move all visible items.

magento_blocks.label: Default Magento Blocks
magento_blocks.comment: In this section you can disable default Magento blocks.

top_links.label: Top Links
top_links.comment: Links in the header: Accoun, Wishlist, Log In etc.

sidebar_blocks_home.label: Disable Sidebar Blocks (On Home Page)
sidebar_blocks_home.comment: In this section you can disable blocks which are displayed in sidebars. These setting only affect the home page.

install.label: Theme Installation
install.comment:
IMPORTANT:
in case you need the original content of some static blocks or pages
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory:
app/code/local/MagenTheme/mtdivas/etc/import/

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If set to "Yes", imported blocks will overwrite existing blocks with the same identifiers (if any blocks with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

import_pages.label: Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create CMS pages provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If set to "Yes", imported pages will overwrite existing pages with the same identifiers (if any pages with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

import_widgets.label: Widget
import_widgets.comment: Click this button to create Widget provided with this theme.

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Enable this option to load "custom.css" file in which you can override the default styling of the theme. To create "custom.css" you can use the file "SAMPLE.custom.css" which is located in skin/frontend/mtdivas/default/css directory.

button_active_bg_color.label: Button Active Background Color
button_active_bg_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

button_active_color.label: Button Active Text Color
button_active_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

font_body_size.label: Basic Font Size
font_body_size.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

primary_font_body_family_group.label: Body Font Family
primary_font_body_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_body_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_body_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_body_font_family.label: Body Font Family - Google Fonts
primary_body_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

primary_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
primary_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

heading_fontheading_labels.label: Font Heading (use for some block and menu)

font_heading_h1.label: H1 Font Size
font_heading_h1.comment: Size of the Title "H1", For Example (36px)

font_heading_h2.label: H2 Font Size
font_heading_h2.comment: Size of the Title "H2", For Example (30px)

font_heading_h3.label: H3 Font Size
font_heading_h3.comment: Size of the Title "H3", For Example (24px)

font_heading_h4.label: H4 Font Size
font_heading_h4.comment: Size of the Title "H4", For Example (18px)

font_heading_h5.label: H5 Font Size
font_heading_h5.comment: Size of the Title "H5", For Example (14px)

font_heading_h6.label: H6 Font Size
font_heading_h6.comment: Size of the Title "H6", For Example (12px)

primary_heading_body_family_group.label: Heading Font Family
primary_heading_body_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_heading_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_heading_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_heading_font_family.label: Body Font Family - Google Fonts
primary_heading_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

heading_header_top.label: Color Top Link (Use for link header top and top link)

top_link_bg_hover_color.label: Header Top Link Background Hover Color

main.label: Main
main.comment: In this tab, you can configure the main section of the page (the section located between the header and the footer).

footer.label: Footer
footer.comment: In this tab, you can configure the entire footer of the page. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sub-sections of the footer. Some of the settings can be overridden in sub-sections.
